Text: With any of these uncracked Mashine Expansion torrents you can use just the samples. The groups, kits, instruments, Multi FX, etc (anything that isn't an audio file.) require activation and can't be used.
Addendum to my last comment: A cracked version of Maschine 1.7.2 can use these expansions. The latest Maschine version is 1.8.1 and I have not seen a crack for it yet.
